WebkitProxy * mpProxy

Detailed Description

HTTP authentication request that must be handled by the user interface.

WebView creates the object and hands it to the current WebViewClient, which must call either proceed(String, String) or cancel().

bool gaia::webkit::HttpAuthHandler::useHttpAuthUsernamePassword ( )
Returns:
True if we can use user credentials on record (ie, if we did not fail trying to use them last time)
